an4.77:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, acinteyyani, na cintetabbani; yani cintento ummadassa vighatassa bhagi assa.
an4.77:1.3: Buddhanam, bhikkhave, buddhavisayo acinteyyo, na cintetabbo;
an4.77:1.4: yam cintento ummadassa vighatassa bhagi assa.
an4.77:1.5: Jhayissa, bhikkhave, jhanavisayo acinteyyo, na cintetabbo;
an4.77:1.6: yam cintento ummadassa vighatassa bhagi assa.
an4.77:1.8: yam cintento ummadassa vighatassa bhagi assa.
an4.77:1.10: yam cintento ummadassa vighatassa bhagi assa.
an4.77:1.11: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari acinteyyani, na cintetabbani; yani cintento ummadassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
